actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials

official_title: To declare certain portions of Pelican Island, Texas, non-navigable.

summary.text: Declares certain portions of Pelican Island, Texas, to be nonnavigable waters. Applies such declaration to areas which are or will be bulkheaded and filled or otherwise occupied by permanent structures, including marina facilities.

titles.title: To declare certain portions of Pelican Island, Texas, non-navigable.
